short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSS Selector Plugin for Strong Scrubber

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allows you to easily add and update URLs on your StrongScrubber.com account. In addition, it provides a visual CSS selector tool to limit the scope of your searching when crawling new or existing sites.
